alfredsnippet.snippet:
Fred Hoyle, The Universe: Past And Present Reflections, Ann. Rev. Astron. Astrophys. 1982. 20, p.17

"True understanding cannot be picked-up casually from a lecturer on the rostrum, any more than one can learn to ride a bicycle by watching someone else riding a bicycle."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Hoyle - True Understanding Must Be Participatory
